meanings.sent1: The puzzle remained uncompleted on the table.
meanings.sent2: The uncompleted painting still lacked the final touches.
meanings.sent3: The uncompleted homework assignment caused a bit of stress.
meanings.sent4: Her uncompleted dreams lingered in the back of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The uncompleted bridge stood as a reminder of the construction delays.

meanings.definition: Not fully carried out or accomplished.
meanings.sent1: The uncompleted project left everyone feeling disappointed.
meanings.sent2: The uncompleted mission required further planning.
meanings.sent3: His uncompleted attempt at baking a cake resulted in a funny mess.
meanings.sent4: The uncompleted journey to success seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The uncompleted novel held the promise of an exciting ending.
